page.title: 05Carton Industries Ltd.
page.content: {Carton Industries Ltd.}originated in Slough in 1944.In 1971 Mr. Shae Simmons and Son bought a{factory}in Bulford Road.Originally the factory was a garage owned by a Mr. Hever who ran a coach firm. Carton Industries now{employ}40 people who are mostly local.The boxes they make are designed in the factory and are made to suit the object that needs packaging.The{materials}used for making these boxes/cartons are mainly corrugated cardboard,plastic and foam for padding.They also use sheets of recycled foam chips.These materials come from a number of suppliers for example Norfolk,Somerset and Yorkshire.For{transport}they have two lorries which are out most days.They sell all over the world.
